name: Hellfire Gears

desc.2: <ct color=#959595>"I've got a clear shot at your shins, you know? So you'd better think twice before saying I'm short, got it?" â€” Koleda, warning a rude business partner</ct>

desc2: Equip to increase Stun Agents' combat capabilities
desc3: A functional W-Engine with ultra-high power capacity. Modified by Koleda, its energy level has almost exceeded the safety limit.
